Text.Page:
The witches are connected to the power of the titans by ouijic energy.

Even if we can eliminate the witches, there's lots of ouijic ore around so reinforcements can always be brought to fill their places.

We need someone to sever the connections from the ouijic ore at Tyrant's Overwatch and Frigid Vigil.
Great job! Now those hags can't cause any more trouble.
Did you solve our problem with the ouijic ore?
